org.pircbotx.hooks

Class ListenerAdapter<T extends PircBotX>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pircbotx.hooks.ListenerAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreHooks, TemporaryListener

    public abstract class ListenerAdapter<T extends PircBotX>
extends Object
implements Listener<T>
    Adapter that provides methods to capture each event separately, removing the need to check, cast, and call your custom method for each event you want to capture.

    To use, simply override the method that has the event you want to capture.

    WARNING: If you are going to be implementing Listener's Listener.onEvent(org.pircbotx.hooks.Event) method, you must call super.onEvent(event), otherwise none of the Adapter hook methods will be called!

    Author:
    Leon Blakey
